header.title: Lib Dems promise £50,000,000,000 windfall if Brexit is cancelled
header.postText: The Liberal Democrats have promised to invest £50billion into public services, if Brexit is cancelled.', 'The party believes that stopping Brexit will generate billions for public finances, because remaining in the EU will increase GDP and also mean the ‘economy will grow faster’.', 'Liberal Democrat leader Jo Swinson is expected to say that the extra £10 billion a year will ‘help build a brighter future’ for the country.', 'The pro-Remain party forecasts that the country’s economy will be 1.9% larger in 2024-25, if it wins the election and stops Brexit.', 'Ms Swinson said: ‘The Liberal Democrats are the only party standing up to stop Brexit and build a brighter future for the UK.', '‘Brexit has taken far longer and cost far more than anyone said it would. But any form of Brexit will damage our jobs, our economy and our public services, starving them of vital cash as the economy struggles along.', '‘The Liberal Democrats will stop Brexit and then use the £50 billion Remain bonus to invest in our public services.', '‘Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Brexit, build a brighter future and invest the £50 billion Remain bonus in our vital public services.’', 'The Lib Dems will launch their General Election campaign later today.', 'The Institute for Fiscal Studies says the Liberal Democrats forecast is reasonable.', 'However, the independent forecaster says it could not predict the overall growth rate and total money saved from remaining in the EU with any certainty.
header.socioLingVar: Nationality - European or anti-Europeans,Age - Youngsters,Physical Identity - Physical (and Mental) Impairments,Gender - General

commentThread.commentText: Lib Dems just voted for more privatisation of the NHS so they wont be spending it there. We pay £250 million to the EU every week, where will she get the £50 million from?

replies.commentText: £813 Billion is out budget for 2019.We send over about £13 Billion after rebates ectIt's really really nothing compared to what we get backfor example Boaders , The ammount of money we save on boarders is huge and time it takes for goods to transfer is also low keeping costs down
Danni Colbert If you can't even spell borders it's very unlikely you are expert in their cost efficiency.

commentThread.commentText: And how much will she get from the EU to stay put, apart from what they already get.

replies.commentText: Her husband gets millions from the EU.
Dudden Hall - No he doesn't.Proper little Billy Bullsh*t, ain't you?
Dudden Hall I've heard that as well. True or not I've no idea but I've heard it.

commentThread.commentText: I always thought she was dim, now it's confirmed. Liberal 'un'democrats what utterly clueless idiots

Doesn't really matter i guess the North east will just be shafted like always, we might be lucky to see 100m of that 50 billion. LIke what we have been getting from the EU 100m a year for 7 years which ended a few years before brexit then was proposed 500m over the course of 6 years from 2021 to 2027 which is 83m per year. Theres a reason i have to travel to the other side of the country to find decent work. Cause there is nowt up here.

replies.commentText: I think the Government in Westminster has been shafting the North for years.

commentThread.commentText: Ursula von der Leyen said she will bring in National Service for under 35s accross the EU for the new EU Army.
"£50 billion brexit bonus." Yeah that meaningless phrase will excite the uninitiated. Until they realise Swinson is attempting to buy votes with money she doesn't have and never will.
I remember the last load of cobblers from her lot something to do with student loans wasn't it? Her figures do not add up either.
